DataElement.preferredName: Systolic Blood Pressure Vital Signs Original Result Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The pressure of the blood against the artery walls during systole represented as a numerical value.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vital Signs Domain Systolic Blood Pressure Vital Signs Original Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to vital sign._The maximum pressure exerted into the systemic arterial circulation during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart._The outcome of the vital signs assessment.
